alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:11AM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds up to 25 mph with gusts to around 30 mph expected. * WHERE...Wharton, Fort Bend, Inland Jackson, Inland Matagorda, Inland Brazoria and Inland Galveston Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to gusty winds, relative humidity values will be quite low. Avoid using fire this afternoon - especially in and near dry grassy areas. Be cautious with equipment and activities to could cause sparks and begin new fires.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
